title: ambassador yg on point
body: baru ollie ini yang "promosi".. entah seberapa meledak kalau holo advent ikutan juga.. 😭🤌 holostone + holobaubau.. tapi kalau indo yg mulai, emang beda.. gerecep.. 👍

channel.name: hololive Chat
channel.guideline:
Post anything about hololive! 
Feel free to talk about streams, live events, merch info, and much more💬

■ Consider the following and create a positive community for everyone❗
💖Share exciting news and favorite moments✨
💖Support live concerts and events together 🎉
💖Report or block harmful posts from (...) on posts!🔕
